issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Wifi ipad (4.3)/4GT ipod touch (4.3) + xCode 3.2.6 + TiMobile 1/6/0 (GA build).

Note seen in 4.2.1. 4.3 specific

1.Phone > Camera > camera overlay AND Phone > Camera > augmented reality
2.look at the bottom of the screen
results: 5-10 pixels of white space on the bottom of screen

same test 4.1/4.2.1 does not show this

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: Unexpected white space in Camera Overlay webview (AND augmented reality AND record video)

comments.body:
{html}
Normally, there would have been a screenshot of this visual anomaly, however, the screen shot did not show the cosmetic error described.  Will not hold up 1.6.1 release for this.  This is reproducible.
We should take a look at this before 1.6.1 if we have time.
{html}
Tested on an iPhone 3GS (iOS 5) using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120904101713, issue still valid.

I cannot reproduce this issue, testing KS with
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.3.201308302458
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.3.v20130904134612
KS[3_1_X]
https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/KitchenSink/tree/3_1_X
Xcode5-DP6
CLI: 3.1.2
Alloy: 1.2.2
Devices:
iPad 4 iOS7(11A4449d)
iPad 4 iOS6.0.1

Closing as cannot reproduce, please reopen if occurs.
